entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -41.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 10:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -41.3°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -45.2°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 48 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 45 in the evening and minus 51 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
